briefTitle: SI-6603 (Condoliase) Study for Lumbar Disc Herniation (Discovery 6603 Study)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Sham-controlled, Comparative Study of SI-6603 in Subjects With Lumbar Disc Herniation (Phase 3)
summary: This study is to evaluate the effectiveness of a single-dose intervertebral disc injection of SI-6603 in subjects with lumbar disc herniation (LDH)

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Week 13 in Average Worst Leg Pain Score During the Past 24 Hours Over the Previous 7 Days
